mean_cn: adj.皇帝的，帝国的；  n.帝国，皇家
mean_en: connected with an empire; connected with the system for measuring length, weight and volume using pounds, inches, etc.
sentence: My grandfather's grandfather once lived an imperial life.
sentence_trans: 我爷爷的爷爷曾经过着帝王般的生活。
word_etyma: imper统治，指挥 + ial形容词后缀 → 具有统治性质的 → imperial帝国的
